text: hello I'm Virginia Governor Ralph
Northam I am thrilled that Amazon Web
Services is partnering with Northern
Virginia Community College to create the
first-ever cloud associate's degree
launching this fall the associate degree
in Applied Sciences in Information
Systems technology with a cloud
computing specialization will prepare
today's graduates for careers in the
expanding cloud computing industry the
new cloud computing program will offer
Nova students the opportunity to gain a
breadth and depth of knowledge in cloud
computing learn relevant programming
languages and acquire the skills
necessary to attain valuable
competency-based certifications
frequently demanded by the industry this
sector is estimated to grow to over 400
billion dollars by 2020 and for the
third year in a row
LinkedIn has identified cloud and
distributed computing as the most
in-demand skill for employers with over
75,000 students Nova is the second
largest multi campus community college
in the United States and the largest
educational institution in Virginia Nova
is also a majority-minority institution
and one of the most diverse student
bodies in the nation graduating a large
number of veterans 29 percent of all
Hispanic students in Virginia and half
of all black students at Virginia's
HBCUs a recognized leader in student
success in STEM education nova graduates
more IT students at the associate degree
level within any community college in
the united states this degree program
marks an exciting first step in a much
broader plan to bring cloud computing
education to students across the
Commonwealth as this degree also extends
to be a bridge into high schools and
four-year institutions in time high
school students will be able to take
dual credit courses from Nova's offering
along with an additional two year
extension for a bachelor's degree from
George Mason University and other
four-year degree programmes throughout
Virginia the work based learning in this
program builds off of Novus
collaboration with Amazon Web Services
and AWS educate on the veterans
apprenticeship program that launched in
November of 2017
today Nova is a leading education
partner in the AWS apprenticeship
program a key part of the new Virginia
economy is building up our talent
pipeline to match our education systems
from K through 12 to higher education
and aligning our training programs
around the skills needed for 21st
century jobs community colleges like
Nova are important engines for workforce
development and this collaboration with
Amazon Web Services will help us build a
stronger more diverse talent pipeline
for the technology sector in Virginia
congratulations on this new partnership
and I look forward to seeing everything
you will accomplish
